name: Hell Towers
description:
Rogue like survival game. Fight enemies in random generated floors.

Drop: Select an Item with 5 and press 5 again.

Use Item: Hold 5

Safe the fantasy world by clearing as many floors as possible. Only the real magician can safe us... Are you the one?

We had no more time to finish the spells and worldmap but there is still time after the Jam :)

Have fun.

Bugs:

1. There is a chance to crash the game by going to the next floor.
